content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast" )

content.text: 2 cups warm water (110 degrees to 115 degrees), divided
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "2 cups warm water (110 degrees to 115 degrees), divided" )

content.text: 1/2 cup rye or whole wheat flour
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "1/2 cup rye or whole wheat flour" )

content.text: 0) In a large mixing bowl, dissolve yeast in 1/2 cup of water.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "dissolve"@27:35 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "yeast"@36:41 / FOOD )
		:gol ( ing-1 "1/2 cup of water"@45:61 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large mixing bowl"@6:25 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Add sugar, oil, salt, rye or whole wheat flour, 3 cups all-purpose flour, and remaining water; beat until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "sugar"@7:12 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "oil"@14:17 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "salt"@19:23 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "rye or whole wheat flour"@25:49 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "3 cups all-purpose flour"@51:75 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "remaining water"@81:96 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "beat"@98:102 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until smooth"@103:115 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Add enough remaining all-purpose flour to form a soft dough.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:prp ( purp-2-0 "to form a soft dough"@42:62 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "enough remaining all-purpose flour"@7:41 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Turn onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 6-8 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "knead"@32:37 / AC
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until smooth and elastic"@38:62 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "about 6-8 minutes"@64:81 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "Turn"@3:7 / AC
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "a floured surface"@13:30 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease top.
5) Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 hour.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Cover and let rise"@3:21 / AC
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "a warm place"@25:37 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until doubled"@38:51 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "about 1 hour"@53:65 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 8) On a greased baking sheet, flatten each half to 1-in.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "flatten"@30:37 / AC
		:ppt ( "each half"@38:47 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-8-0 "a greased baking sheet"@6:28 / TOOL )
		:reshape ( "1-in."@51:56 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Pierce each loaf several times with a fork.
10) Cover and let rise in a warm place until nearly doubled, about 30 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "Cover and let rise"@4:22 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-10-0 "a warm place"@26:38 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-10-0 "until nearly doubled"@39:59 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-10-0 "about 30 minutes"@61:77 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 11) Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.
content.eamr:
( inst-11 / R
	:inform ( ac-11-0 "Bake"@4:8 / AC
		:heat ( temp-11-0 "375 degrees F"@12:25 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-11-1 "190 degrees C"@-1:-1 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-11-0 "25-30 minutes"@-1:-1 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-11-0 "until golden brown"@-1:-1 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
